translations: n．方言，土语：指某一地区或社群特有的语言，通常与官方语言或标准语言有所不同。
· The book is written in the vernaculars of the region.
这本书是用该地区的方言写的。

sentences.sentence: The most widely spoken of modern indic vernaculars spoken mostly in the of India along with English it is the official language of India usually written in devanagari script.
sentences.translation: 现代印度使用最广泛的方言；主要分布于北印度；和英语一块儿都是印度的官方语言；通常是以梵文天城体手迹所写的。

sentences.sentence: The most widely spoken of modern indic vernaculars spoken mostly in the north of India along with English it is the official language of India usually written in devanagari script.
sentences.translation: 现代印度使用最广泛的方言；主要分布于北印度；和英语一块儿都是印度的官方语言；通常是以梵文天城体手迹所写的。
